dialogue.line: Great, a talking cat. I'm definitely dreaming now.
I can hear you, you know. And you aren't dreaming.
I'm looking for my son, have you seen him?
When was the last time you cried, Raymond?
Look, I don't have time for this. Can you help me find my son or not?
That depends. Can you answer my question?
When was the last time I... God, I don't know. It's not something I keep track of.
It's good to let your emotions out sometimes.
It's good for your son, too.
I've noticed you tend to take his emotions quite personally...
What do you mean you've noticed? You're a goddamn cat.
Listen, if you aren't going to help me, then quit wasting my time.
